GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: initialize delayed works at l2cap_chan_create()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.262 by commit d407ba4663058949de79f0d5fc90703abeddcd69. For more details please see the references link.
